name: Demon Rising
description: Samael in red-hot armor is inextricably linked with his wife Lilith - together being one whole personification of Evil. Infernal flame bursts into the universe, burning it. The Demon's right hand has 6 fingers, the left is smaller than the right (androgyny) and is bloody - this is the ritual of giving blood to Hell. Each drop of precious dark blood builds a different universe .. In this one can find a parallel - becoming drop by drop, development gradually, growing demonic, constant renewal of the connection between the Operator and the Abyss. Blood will open the Gate.   6 fingers are a defect, among those who know it is considered the mark of the Devil, like all deformities. So, the total number of fingers on the palms gives the number 11 - the number of Chaos, the break of the Circle of the Logos.    Around the head of the Devil there is a black halo and a crown of fire, because He is the Rising Black Sun, in conjunction with Lilith, the Black Moon, which a snake comes from the Devil's genital area, just as the Devil's hands grow from the mouths of beasts - shoulders, legs - an endless ball serpent, meaning the omnipresent, all-round presence of the predatory Darkness and the Plurality of One called the Legion.    The skin of the Devil is a dragon, his mouth smiles ominously and is always bloody - from eating victims and from endless battles. Anthropomorphism means resemblance to a Satanist, his Super Ego, a black hood half reveals his face, half hides - what is from the Devil, what is known and what is allowed to be open and what is hidden and unknown
